section.title: ASSESSMENTS
section.text: Patient has pain in his lower left jaw and occassional bleeding from his gums - referring for dental evaluation.

list.item: At high risk for dental carries

value.displayName: At high risk for dental caries (finding)

translation.displayName: At high risk for dental caries (finding)

code.displayName: Physical findings of the Mouth and Throat and Teeth

translation.displayName: Vital signs, weight, height, head circumference, oximetry, BMI, and BSA panel

section.title: INSTRUCTIONS
section.text: Pt. Education. Advised to see dentist regularly, brush 2x/day w/ fluoride toothpaste, floss

text.paragraph: the patient has not visited a dentist or received fluoride treatments in the past four years while away at college
